name: The Banshee
description:
It's a dark dreary night, being driven away from sleep by the sound of thunder and slashing rain, until you are compelled out of bed due to some mysterious sounds...

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

- Use mouse to look around

- LMB to interact

- WASD to move

- LShift to sprint

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

This is a short game about a Banshee, my loose take and interpretation on the Irish folk legend, following the Folk Horror theme for the HPS1 Halloween Jam.

This game is my submission the HPS1 Halloween Jam 2020. This is also my second game.

Also a submission to Devtober 2020 and the 32-Bit Jam.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Feedback is always appreciated.
